trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There was one other sighting in Kokomo on or around July 25th 2008
Summary: I was on my way home when i took notice to one star
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home when i took notcie to one star...it seemed to be moving so I pulled over to the side of the road and watched it move side to side then shot to the right stood still and then went out...I kept watching and it reapeared in the same area in which it went out and then "shut off again" I stayed there for about 15 mins waiting to see if I could see it aain to no avail. Indiana seems to be having a lot of these lately!
